translation.en: [Cian] Can you tell me about your dating history?
My dating history?
[chuckles] What? Oh, I don't have any. What?
translation.de: Was? Ich hatte noch nie eins.

translation.en: Is that a serious question?
I've never been on a date before.
translation.de: Ich hatte noch nie ein Date.

translation.en: Something always seems to either go wrong
or… kind of trigger my flight reflex.
translation.de: Entweder geht irgendetwas schief oder… Oder etwas löst eine Fluchtreaktion aus.

translation.en: I never had a girlfriend, not even when I was in high school.
translation.de: Ich hatte noch nie eine Freundin, nicht mal in der Highschool.

translation.en: I'm on my quest for true love, and I cannot give up on that.
translation.de: Ich suche wahre Liebe und darf nicht aufgeben.

translation.en: [narrator] Finding love can be hard for anyone.
translation.de: Liebe zu finden, kann jedem schwerfallen.

translation.en: You don't force love. You just let it come to you.
translation.de: Man erzwingt Liebe nicht. Man lässt sie zu sich kommen.

translation.en: I'll remember that. Thanks.
[narrator] And for some people, it can feel like an impossible dream.
translation.de: Für manche fühlt es sich wie ein unmöglicher Traum an.

translation.en: I'm 30, and I thought I would've had a girlfriend by now.
translation.de: Ich dachte, mit 30 hätte ich eine Freundin.

translation.en: [Sharnae] Wow! Holy shit!
[narrator] This series follows young adults on the autism spectrum…
translation.de: Diese Serie folgt jungen Erwachsenen auf dem Autismusspektrum…

translation.en: Say hello to my future husband or wife.
Hello, there.
[narrator] …as they navigate the confusing world of relationships and dating.
translation.de: …während sie die verwirrende Welt der Beziehungen und Dates erleben.

translation.en: -What's your age limit? -Seventy.
[narrator] From first dates…
Just I'm trying to, um, make up conversation.
[Jayden] It seems that she only would like to see me again as a friend.
translation.de: Sie sieht mich wohl eher nur als Freund.

translation.en: [narrator] …to the first sparks of romance…
-I've never been kissed by a girl. -[woman] Have you?
She's perfect. Absolutely perfect.
[narrator] …and happily ever after.
Welcome back, ladies and gentlemen.
This is series two of Love on the Spectrum.
translation.de: bei der zweiten Staffel Liebe im Spektrum.

translation.en: I don't really need to introduce myself because you al-- already know who I am.
translation.de: Ich muss mich nicht vorstellen, denn ihr kennt mich schon.

translation.en: Michael, of course.
-[Cian] Are you glad to be back, Michael? -Yes, I am. Definitely.
translation.de: -Bist du froh, zurück zu sein? -Ja, bin ich. Definitiv.

translation.en: [Cian] And why are you back?
I'm continuing my-- my quest for true love.
translation.de: Ich setze meine Suche nach wahrer Liebe fort.

translation.en: [Cian] And you're just as keen to find someone special?
translation.de: Bist du immer noch so begeistert dabei?

translation.en: I don't feel any-- any less keen than what I did last year.
translation.de: Ich bin nicht weniger begeistert als letztes Jahr.

translation.en: In fact, if anything, it's kinda strengthened.
translation.de: Ich will es irgendwie sogar noch mehr.

translation.en: I just can't bear the thought of being single my entire life
translation.de: Ich will nicht mein Leben lang single sein.

translation.en: because it's lonely. It's boring, and it's also unfulfilling.
translation.de: Es ist einsam, langweilig und nicht erfüllend.

translation.en: And it makes you feel like you lack a purpose.
I can't see myself without a wife.
translation.de: Ich kann mich nicht ohne Ehefrau sehen.

translation.en: There's no other way for me.
[narrator] Michael lives with his family in Wollongong, New South Wales.
translation.de: Michael lebt mit seiner Familie in Wollongong, Neusüdwales.

translation.en: [sister] Michael, can you open the jar for me?
-[Michael] Yep. -Adam shut it too tight. Thanks.
Thank you.
I've been ignored by a lot of girls throughout my life,
translation.de: Ich wurde von vielen Mädchen ignoriert,

translation.en: and honestly, it's no fun.
If they're not interested, they're not interested.
-[Michael] Yeah. -What do you expect them to do?
-[Michael scoffs] Nothing. -That's right.
So you've just gotta keep searching.
-Not every girl's gonna be interested. -[Michael] No.
[sister] I think you should continue with your online dating.
translation.de: Du solltest mit dem Onlinedating weitermachen.

translation.en: I don't think it's the answer for me.
translation.de: Das ist keine Lösung für mich.

translation.en: Right now, maybe you feel that way because you've had no success with it,
translation.de: Gerade denkst du vielleicht so, weil du keinen Erfolg hattest,

translation.en: but I wouldn't close the door to it.
translation.de: aber gib es nicht ganz auf.

translation.en: Well, in 2018, I gave eHarmony 12 chances.
One chance per month.
What if it was the 13th month that you would've--
-There is no 13th month. -[laughing]
translation.de: Den gibt es nicht. Das Jahr hat nur 12 Monate.

translation.en: -There's only 12 months in a year. -I know.
translation.de: Den gibt es nicht. Das Jahr hat nur 12 Monate. Ich weiß, aber wenn du weitermachst

translation.en: But if you kept going,
translation.de: Ich weiß, aber wenn du weitermachst

translation.en: and on the 13th month that you were with eHarmony--
Mom, I decided if I didn't have any success by the end of the year,
translation.de: Ich gab mir bis Jahresende, Erfolg zu haben.

translation.en: I would not continue my profile.
translation.de: Sonst gebe ich mein Profil auf.

translation.en: That was a waste of $240. I'm not doing that again.
translation.de: Ich werde nicht noch mal 240 $ verschwenden.

translation.en: Because after all, I still have a house to save for.
translation.de: Ich muss schließlich für ein Haus sparen.

translation.en: And I'm not gonna be able to buy it at this rate.
translation.de: Wenn das so weitergeht, wird das nichts.

translation.en: I know. It all counts.
Spending $200 on something valuable, like a crystal, for example,
that's something I'm actually cool with.
Hello, I'm Ronan.
I'm 21 years of age.
[Cian] Nice to meet you, Ronan.
Pleasure.
[Cian] Tell me a bit about yourself.
So I would describe myself as a kind,
translation.de: Ich bin allen Menschen gegenüber nett,

translation.en: generous, helpful, polite man to every people.
[Cian] And what does autism mean for you? Like, how does autism affect you?
translation.de: Was bedeutet Autismus für dich? Wie wirkt es sich auf dich aus?

translation.en: Sometimes I might have a bit of confusion,
and sometimes I might need a lot of help and support.
translation.de: und manchmal brauche ich viel Hilfe und Unterstützung.

translation.en: -[Cian] Have you ever been in love? -I've never been in love before.
translation.de: Warst du schon mal verliebt? Ich war noch nie verliebt.

translation.en: Really, like, it's just like my own-- it's my destiny.
translation.de: Es ist wie mein eigenes Schicksal.

translation.en: Like, really wanna find a girl that truly cares about me and loves me.
translation.de: Ich will ein Mädchen finden, dem ich wirklich viel bedeute.

translation.en: My dream girl would be, like-- like, wonderful and-- and splendid.
translation.de: Meine Traumfrau ist wunderbar und großartig.

translation.en: Like, she might have musical talents, like as much as I do.
translation.de: Vielleicht hat sie musikalische Talente, genau wie ich.

translation.en: [Cian] That was very nice. You're good at that.
translation.de: Das war schön. Du kannst das gut.

translation.en: You'll be able to impress a lady with that, I reckon.
translation.de: Damit kannst du eine Dame beeindrucken.

translation.en: Yeah, I would be able to impress a lady.
translation.de: Ja, damit könnte ich eine Dame beeindrucken.

translation.en: [narrator] Ronan lives with his parents and his older brother.
translation.de: Ronan lebt bei seinen Eltern und seinem älteren Bruder.

translation.en: Should I play something now?
-Yeah, get Jordan to play something. -[chuckles] He's good on the piano.
translation.de: Ja, Jordan soll etwas spielen. Er kann gut Klavier spielen.

translation.en: -He'd be terrible. -[laughs]
-Would he? Do you think so? -[chuckles]
[Ronan] He hasn't even played piano before.
translation.de: Er hat noch nie Klavier gespielt.

translation.en: No, but it's nice for me because I've got two sons with different skills.
translation.de: Aber es ist schön, weil ich zwei Söhne mit verschiedenen Fähigkeiten habe.

translation.en: -Yeah, different skills. -[mother] Yeah.
[Cian] So what do you think about Ronan's desire to meet someone?
translation.de: Was hältst du von Ronans Wunsch, jemanden zu treffen?

translation.en: I think it's great. I think this is the next phase in his life, really.
translation.de: Es ist toll. Das ist die nächste Phase in seinem Leben.

translation.en: I mean, we've got through school and now found some employment,
translation.de: Wir haben die Schule überstanden und Arbeit gefunden,

translation.en: and I think this is something that, you know, is really important to him.
translation.de: und ich denke, das ist etwas, das ihm sehr wichtig ist.

translation.en: I'll do whatever it takes to find a girlfriend.
translation.de: Ich werde alles tun, um eine Freundin zu finden.

translation.en: He's caring. He's kind. He's compassionate. He makes us laugh.
translation.de: Er ist fürsorglich, er ist nett. Er ist mitfühlend, er bringt uns zum Lachen.

translation.en: He's come a long way.
All of us in the family never dreamed that he would be at the stage he is now.
translation.de: Wir hätten nie gedacht, dass er mal so weit kommen würde.

translation.en: We thought that he will be, most of the time, just wanting to be on his own,
translation.de: Wir dachten, er würde die meiste Zeit allein sein wollen.

translation.en: um, because when he was younger, that's pretty much what he wanted to do.
translation.de: Als er jünger war, wollte er das auch.

translation.en: So the fact that now he'd like to have that special person
translation.de: Dass er jetzt jemand Besonderes sucht,

translation.en: that, you know, he can turn to--
translation.de: an den er sich wenden kann und…

translation.en: I mean, he's come this far, which is amazing,
translation.de: Er ist so weit gekommen, was toll ist…

translation.en: so there's no reason why he can't.
translation.de: Wieso sollte das also nicht klappen?

translation.en: [Ronan] When I do find a girlfriend, I just hope that,
translation.de: Wenn ich eine Freundin finde, hoffe ich,

translation.en: by the time I get to know the girl a lot more, when I become older,
translation.de: wenn ich sie mit der Zeit besser kennenlerne,

translation.en: I might-- I might get married to the girl,
and I might live in a--
I might live in a house of my own with the girl.
translation.de: Und ich mit ihr in meinem eigenen Haus lebe.

translation.en: [Cian] Are you gonna be nervous when Ronan goes on his first date?
translation.de: Wirst du nervös sein bei Ronans erstem Date?

translation.en: Of course! [laughs]
[sighs] I've been nervous all my life…
[laughs] …with everything that Ronan takes on.
-You know what you do every single time? -What?
You amaze me and surprise me how well you cope
translation.de: Du erstaunst und überraschst mich, wie gut du mit mit all den neuen Dingen umgehst, die du machst.

translation.en: and how well you manage all the new things you do.
translation.de: wie gut du mit mit all den neuen Dingen umgehst, die du machst.

translation.en: [Ronan] Yeah.
So I've kind of learned over the years
not to worry so much, because I know you're gonna be fine.
translation.de: mir weniger Sorgen zu machen, weil ich weiß, dass es dir gut geht.

translation.en: -[Ronan] Yeah. -[mother] Mm-hmm.
[Ronan] Yeah, I'm always gonna be fine.
translation.de: Es wird mir immer gut gehen.

translation.en: The main thing I want is for you to find the right person.
translation.de: Das Wichtigste ist, dass du die richtige Person findest.

translation.en: Do you wanna go and put some place mats out,
and we'll go have some lunch?
translation.de: damit wir zu Mittag essen können?

translation.en: Do you think he's a good role model to learn off
translation.de: Ist er ein gutes Vorbild, wenn es um Dating geht,

translation.en: when he's dating his girlfriends, or do you think you could do it better?
translation.de: Ist er ein gutes Vorbild, wenn es um Dating geht, oder kannst du das besser?

translation.en: I make too many jokes, I think. I make too much fun of them.
translation.de: Ich mache mich zu sehr über sie lustig…

translation.en: But I would do the right thing and make it all positive.
translation.de: Aber ich würde das Richtige tun und positiv sein.

translation.en: Hmm. That's right. You would. Any girl will be lucky to have you.
translation.de: Das stimmt. Jedes Mädchen könnte sich glücklich schätzen.

translation.en: And I hope she likes chicken.
And I sure hope that she likes meatballs, sausages and pizza as well.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, dass sie Fleischbällchen, Würstchen und Pizza mag.

translation.en: When I see my brother hanging out with his girlfriend,
translation.de: Wenn ich sehe, wie mein Bruder mit seiner Freundin abhängt,

translation.en: it made me feel jealous. Like thinking…
translation.de: bin ich eifersüchtig. Ich frage mich:

translation.en: "Why does he get a girlfriend and not me?"
translation.de: "Warum hat er eine Freundin und ich nicht?"

translation.en: [Cian] Hmm. Well, I'm sure you'll have a girlfriend one day.
translation.de: Eines Tages hast du sicher eine.

translation.en: Yeah, hopefully is all I can say.
This is my bedroom.
There's, like, a lot of pictures around me, like V8 Supercars pictures.
translation.de: Um mich herum sind viele Bilder, zum Beispiel von V8 Supercars.

translation.en: And even the bedsheet, it's like, "Born to race,"
translation.de: Und sogar das Bettlaken sagt: "Zum Rasen geboren."

translation.en: which includes the drivers. Like, they were born to race.
translation.de: Das schließt die Fahrer mit ein. Sie wurden geboren, um Rennen zu fahren.

translation.en: For instance, Shane van Gisbergen.
He's good at drifting,
and he's also good at doing burnouts as well.
translation.de: Und Burnouts kann er auch gut.

translation.en: He's so crazy.
[Cian] What's drifting?
Drifting is like you burn the tires and smoke billows out,
translation.de: Beim Driften verbrennst du die Reifen, und Rauch steigt auf,

translation.en: and you're just like…
[Cian] So do you like drifting and burnouts?
[chuckles] Yeah, sure do, 'cause it's-- it's so hilarious.
translation.de: Ja. Es ist einfach so lustig.

translation.en: So hilarious to watch. It makes me laugh.
translation.de: So lustig, zuzusehen. Es bringt mich zum Lachen.

translation.en: And then this is like a lamp.
It used to be in Aladdin, the movie,
translation.de: Die ist aus Aladdin, dem Film.

translation.en: and sometimes if you rub it,
translation.de: Und wenn man an ihr reibt,

translation.en: you get to make a wish.
Get this, for instance. I'm rubbing.
translation.de: Pass auf. Ich reibe an ihr.

translation.en: I close my eyes and say,
translation.de: Ich schließe die Augen und sage:

translation.en: "I wish to get a girlfriend of mine
who likes the same interests as much as I do."
translation.de: die dieselben Interessen hat wie ich."

translation.en: [Cian] Sounds good. Well, hopefully it'll work.
Hopefully it will.
[Cian] How do you feel about living at home with your family?
translation.de: Wie ist es, bei deiner Familie zu leben?

translation.en: -I don't really enjoy it that much. -[Cian] Why not?
translation.de: -Ich mag es nicht sehr gern. -Warum nicht?

translation.en: Women don't like to be married to men who still live with their parents
translation.de: Frauen wollen keine Männer heiraten, die bei ihren Eltern leben.

translation.en: because it's kinda embarrassing.
I'm four years away from turning 30.
For a while, I've been feeling like I'm still a boy
translation.de: Ich fühle mich noch wie ein Junge,

translation.en: because… a boy needs-- needs his parents for company.
translation.de: weil ein Junge seine Eltern braucht.

translation.en: A man needs a spouse.
[narrator] Michael is getting ready for a night of speed dating.
translation.de: Michael bereitet sich auf einen Abend mit Speed Dating vor.

translation.en: -[Cian] What do you think? -Perfect.
-[Cian] You excited about tonight? -Yep, definitely.
You could meet your million dollars tonight, Michael.
translation.de: Du könntest heute die Eine treffen.

translation.en: With any luck. Okay, Cian, um, how about this?
translation.de: Mit Glück. Okay, Cian, was sagst du hierzu?

translation.en: [Cian] Yeah, if you think that works. Why don't you ask your mom?
translation.de: Ja, das funktioniert. Frag doch mal deine Mum.

translation.en: Whatever makes you feel good, just wear it.
This one I feel more comfortable in anyway.
translation.de: In diesem fühle ich mich wohler.

translation.en: You wear what you're comfortable in because that's when you're going to be at your best.
translation.de: Zieh das an, worin du dich wohlfühlst, denn dann bist du am besten.

translation.en: -Yep. -[mother] So wear what you like.
Because, after all, this is Mr. A Plus' attire, anyway.
translation.de: Das ist schließlich die Kleidung vom Eins-A-Partner.

translation.en: [laughing] That's right.
Okay, I, uh,
will need a little bit of, um, privacy.
-But before I do, I've gotta fix this up. -[Cian] What? What is that?
translation.de: Aber vorher kümmere ich mich hierum. Was ist das?

translation.en: Just little-- few hairs between the eyebrows.
translation.de: Ein paar Haare zwischen den Augenbrauen.

translation.en: [laughing] Just-- he just cracks me up.
Every time.
We talked about what he was gonna wear last night.
translation.de: Wir sprachen über sein Outfit von gestern.

translation.en: Michael was going, "Well, you don't know. I might just wear my chinos."
translation.de: Und er sagte: "Vielleicht ziehe ich einfach meine Chino an…"

translation.en: I'm like, "Listen, Mike. Yeah, sure you will, Mike.
translation.de: Und er sagte: "Vielleicht ziehe ich einfach meine Chino an…" "Als ob, Mike. Du wirst deinen Anzug anziehen."

translation.en: I know you're gonna wear your suit." [laughing]
translation.de: "Als ob, Mike. Du wirst deinen Anzug anziehen."

translation.en: [laughing] Actually, I remember when he was 13…
He came home from school,
and he said, "I know what I'm gonna be when I grow up."
translation.de: und sagte: "Ich weiß, was ich mal werden will."

translation.en: And I said, "Really? And what's that?"
And he goes, "A gangster."
And I go, "Michael, why do you wanna be a gangster?"
translation.de: "Michael, warum willst du ein Gangster sein?"

translation.en: And he said, "Because they can wear suits every day to work."
translation.de: Und er sagte "Weil sie jeden Tag Anzüge zur Arbeit tragen können."

translation.en: I said, "Hey, Mike, do you know what they have to do?"
translation.de: Ich fragte, ob er wisse, was sie tun.

translation.en: And then I told him and I gave him, like, a mini job description,
translation.de: Also gab ich ihm eine kurze Jobbeschreibung.

translation.en: and then, he said, "Oh, no, I don't think I'll be a gangster."
translation.de: Und er sagte: "Ich werde wohl doch kein Gangster."

translation.en: [Michael grunts] Done.
Well, look at you, huh?
Yep, Mr. A Plus is back.
[laughs] Yep, you are. I love it.
translation.de: Ja, das bist du. Gefällt mir.

translation.en: [Michael] Thanks.
-[mother] You ready for tonight? Nervous? -[Michael] Yes. Not really.
[Michael] Even though it's a mainstream event.
It is. That's what you asked for.
-I was a bit surprised, actually. -[Michael] Why?
Because I'd like to encounter some women that are not on the spectrum.
translation.de: Ich möchte Frauen treffen, die nicht auf dem Spektrum sind.

translation.en: I wanna see what they would be like with somebody who is on the spectrum,
translation.de: Ich will sehen, wie sie mit jemandem umgehen, der auf dem Spektrum ist,

translation.en: but doesn't quite seem like it.
-You just wanna see how it would work. -Yeah.
But you're not opposed to dating someone on the spectrum, are you?
translation.de: Aber du würdest jemanden auf dem Spektrum daten?

translation.en: -No. -You want somebody that's independent.
-[Michael] Yes. -Is that right?
But also somebody who's a girl next door type.
translation.de: Aber auch ein Mädchen von nebenan.

translation.en: Oh, okay.
-I better get going. -[mother] See ya. You look wonderful.
Thank you.
-[mother] Do I get a kiss? -Sure, Mom.
All right. And good luck.
-Thank you. Take care. -Yeah.
-[mother] Hope you have a good time. -[Michael] I will.
Hi. [chuckles]
I'm Kassandra. I'm 27, and I'm single. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich bin Kassandra. Ich bin 27 und single.

translation.en: [Cian] Have you ever been in love?
I don't know. I-- I know I love my family.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Ich liebe meine Familie.

translation.en: I know I love my friends,
but I don't know what intimate love is yet.
translation.de: Aber ich weiß noch nicht, was intime Liebe ist.

translation.en: I've read books,
both fiction and nonfiction,
about what love should be,
but I don't know if I've ever been in love.
translation.de: Aber ich weiß nicht, ob ich je verliebt war.

translation.en: [Cian] How would you describe yourself?
Weird.
And I love being weird.
I've got a jar of teeth. [chuckles]
[Cian] Whose teeth?
They are my teeth and my siblings'.
I love my plush toys.
I have received a few of these from previous partners.
translation.de: Einige davon sind von früheren Partnern.

translation.en: One of them did give me the Mewtwo to match… my Mew at the time,
translation.de: Einer gab mir Mewtu, passend zu meinem Mew.

translation.en: 'cause we were meant to be a set.
Didn't work out very well. I haven't been very lucky in love,
translation.de: Hat nicht gut geklappt. Ich hatte nicht viel Glück in der Liebe.

translation.en: but, um, I've kept them. They're a little bit precious to me.
translation.de: Aber ich habe sie behalten. Sie bedeuten mir viel.

translation.en: [Cian] Has anyone ever said to you, "You don't look autistic"?
translation.de: Sagte dir mal jemand, dass du nicht autistisch aussiehst?

translation.en: Quite often. You can't see my brain. [laughs] And it's my brain that's different.
translation.de: Ziemlich oft. Du siehst mein Gehirn nicht. Und mein Gehirn ist anders.

translation.en: [Cian] When you were younger, was there a point where you started
translation.de: Als du jünger warst, hattest du das Gefühl, anders zu sein als andere Kinder?

translation.en: to feel like you were different to the other kids at school?
translation.de: hattest du das Gefühl, anders zu sein als andere Kinder?

translation.en: It would've been about grade four, maybe grade five.
translation.de: Das war in der vierten oder fünften Klasse.

translation.en: I remember looking up and realizing that kids sat in groups,
translation.de: Ich sah auf und merkte, dass Kinder in Gruppen saßen,

translation.en: but I sat on my own.
And I remember that week trying to sit in with the group,
translation.de: Ich weiß noch, wie ich versuchte, bei der Gruppe zu sitzen,

translation.en: and it was awful.
And I remember that week going, "I am not the same,"
translation.de: Damals dachte ich mir, dass ich anders bin.

translation.en: and it wouldn't be for three and a half years later for me to get diagnosed.
translation.de: Und erst dreieinhalb Jahre später bekam ich die Diagnose.

translation.en: [Cian] How did you feel when you were diagnosed?
I was happy.
Having someone tell me that,
"No, this is what it is,
and there are thousands of other people like you,"
translation.de: und es gibt Tausende andere wie dich."

translation.en: it made me feel human again.
I didn't feel completely outcast anymore.
translation.de: Ich fühlte mich nicht mehr völlig ausgeschlossen.

translation.en: I still think it's probably one of the best days of my life.
translation.de: Das war einer der besten Tage meines Lebens.

translation.en: This is my games room.
A few years back, one of our concerts, we had a Kylie Minogue theme,
translation.de: Kylie Minogue war das Thema bei einem Konzert vor ein paar Jahren,

translation.en: and, uh, my sister wore this one.
I'm planning to repurpose it into a new cosplay.
translation.de: Ich werde es für ein neues Cosplay verwenden.

translation.en: Um, I haven't decided exactly which character.
translation.de: Aber ich weiß noch nicht, für welche Figur.

translation.en: So this is one of my, um, prop daggers.
I also have this one.
"Winter is coming."
It sits perfectly on me.
Cosplay is dressing up as your favorite characters
translation.de: Beim Cosplay verkleidet man sich als seine Lieblingsfigur

translation.en: and bringing them to life.
It helps with going into social situations.
I don't have to be me.
I can be another character,
translation.de: Ich kann jemand anderes sein, und…

translation.en: and there's a lot less stress
translation.de: Ich kann jemand anderes sein, und… Es ist weniger stressig, dieser Charakter zu sein als ich selbst.

translation.en: on being those characters than being myself.
translation.de: Es ist weniger stressig, dieser Charakter zu sein als ich selbst.

translation.en: One of the biggest things I've had to learn is what people call masking,
translation.de: "Masking" war mit das Größte, was ich lernen musste.

translation.en: pretending and hiding the parts of me that don't fit neurotypical society.
translation.de: Das zu verstecken und vorzutäuschen, das nicht zur neurotypischen Gesellschaft passt.

translation.en: In a perfect world,
no, I wouldn't have to learn how to word things
translation.de: müsste ich nicht lernen, mich auszudrücken,

translation.en: so a neurotypical person doesn't find offense where there is none to be had,
translation.de: damit eine neurotypische Person nicht grundlos beleidigt ist.

translation.en: but we don't live in a perfect world.
translation.de: Aber das ist keine perfekte Welt.

translation.en: -I missed you guys. -We missed you too!
So I'm thinking of starting dating again.
translation.de: Ich will wieder auf Dates gehen.

translation.en: -[Kassandra] Yeah. -Awesome.
What kind of person would you like to meet?
Um, someone that's kind of…
kind of like us, but not 100% like us.
translation.de: Die wie wir ist, aber nicht zu 100 %.

translation.en: -Yeah. -I think the same here.
Otherwise I probably would've dated one of you guys, and that would've been weird.
translation.de: Sonst hätte ich einen von euch gedatet, und das wäre komisch gewesen.

translation.en: But I guess definitely not clingy.
You remember the last time I dated someone who was clingy.
translation.de: Erinnert ihr euch an die letzte Person?

translation.en: They wanted to, like, text me morning and night. Like, "good morning and good night" every day.
translation.de: Sie wollte mir jeden Tag "guten Morgen" und "gute Nacht" schreiben.

translation.en: [woman] You just want someone to encourage your dreams,
translation.de: Du willst jemanden, der dich unterstützt.

translation.en: and you encourage theirs and push each other to your goals.
translation.de: Ihr helft euch gegenseitig, eure Ziele zu erreichen.

translation.en: [Kassandra] That would be so good.
[chuckles] It's just difficult to find, especially as an autistic adult.
translation.de: Es ist schwer, jemanden als autistischer Erwachsener zu finden.

translation.en: Like, if you tell people that outright, half the time they'll judge you
translation.de: Sagst du es den Leuten direkt, verurteilen sie dich meist,

translation.en: and think you've been keeping it secret.
translation.de: und denken, du hieltest es geheim.

translation.en: I think someone who's gonna understand you.
-You need that. -Not-- not just a little bit of you.
-Like, the whole you. -Whole of you.
They'd also have to, like, fit in with you guys enough.
translation.de: Und sie muss zu euch passen.

translation.en: They'll have to do, like, the nerd 101 test.
This is gonna be good. Like, I've got my wing person.
translation.de: Das wird super. Ich habe meine Date-Unterstützung.

translation.en: I've got my buddies.
-I will do it. I will find someone. -We're your cheering squad. Whoo!
translation.de: -Ich werde jemanden finden. -Wir feuern dich an.

translation.en: [Cian] When it comes to dating, what's your greatest fear?
translation.de: Was ist deine größte Angst, wenn es ums Dating geht?

translation.en: [exhales] Rejection.
There's nothing more terrifying to me on this earth
translation.de: Es gibt nichts Schrecklicheres für mich

translation.en: than a life doomed to loneliness.
It's almost like feeling like an abandoned toy left in the closet
translation.de: Es fühlt sich fast an wie ein vergessenes Spielzeug,

translation.en: while all the other toys are out being played with.
translation.de: während mit allen anderen gespielt wird.

translation.en: Much like how Woody was in Toy Story 4 when he was left in the closet.
translation.de: So wie Woody in Toy Story 4, als er im Schrank lag.

translation.en: That's exactly how I feel a lot.
[narrator] Tonight, Michael is attending a speed-dating event.
translation.de: Heute ist Michael beim Speed Dating.

translation.en: -[host] Hello. -[Michael] Hello.
-[host] How are you? -Good. Yourself?
-Do you wanna take a seat? -[Michael] Thank you.
-Hello. How are you? -[Michael] Hello. Good. Yourself?
Well, thank you.
-My name's Amelia. -I'm Michael.
-Nice to meet you. -Likewise.
-I like the outfit. -Thanks.
I like how the tie matches the handkerchief.
-It's actually a pocket square. -Very nice.
What do you do in your spare time? What do you get up to?
Voice acting or watching television.
-What sort of voice acting? -There is one I've been trying lately.
translation.de: Wen sprichst du? -Einen Charakter übe ich gerade. -Den würde ich gern hören.

translation.en: -Love to hear it. -[imitates Scooby-Doo]
translation.de: -Einen Charakter übe ich gerade. -Den würde ich gern hören.

translation.en: -Scooby-Dooby-Doo! -That's what I thought it was! [laughs]
And there's another character. It's called Muttley.
translation.de: Und dann gibt es noch Muttley.

translation.en: -That's really cool. -Yeah.
There's also, um, toy collecting, as well.
-Really? -Yeah.
-What, like vintage toys or--? -No. Thomas.
-The Tank Engine? -Yeah.
My little brother loves Thomas the Tank Engine.
translation.de: Mein kleiner Bruder ist ein großer Fan.

translation.en: -How old is he, may I ask? -He is three years old.
translation.de: -Wie alt ist er? -Er ist drei Jahre alt.

translation.en: -Ah. -He's very fond of Thomas the Tank Engine.
-I mean, who isn't? -Yeah, that's true. That's true.
-I think everyone is pretty fond of him. -Yeah.
Do you have any hobbies that you like to do besides…
translation.de: Hast du Hobbys, die du gern machst außer…

translation.en: Yeah, I go wakeboarding when I can get the chance.
-Wake-- wakeboarding? -It's like snowboarding, but on water.
-Oh. -Yeah, you get hooked on to a cable. And you get pulled around,
translation.de: Man wird an einem Kabel herumgezogen,

translation.en: and there's different tricks and whatnot that you can do. I've got my own board--
translation.de: und es gibt verschiedene Tricks. Ich habe ein eigenes…

translation.en: -[clinking] -All right, everyone.
-It was really nice to meet you, Michael. -Likewise, Amelia. Take care.
translation.de: -Hat mich sehr gefreut, Michael. -Ebenso, Amelia. Alles Gute.

translation.en: -I'm Michael. -I'm Taylor.
-Nice to meet you, Taylor. -[chuckles] You too.
Your-- your top looks abs-- absolutely amazing.
Thank you. [chuckles]
-And so does your hair color. -Thank you.
I got it from my grandmother, actually.
translation.de: Die habe ich von meiner Großmutter.

translation.en: Do you mind if I ask what year you were born?
translation.de: Darf ich fragen, wann du geboren wurdest?

translation.en: Uh, 1996. Two years after me.
-[Taylor] Really? -Yeah.
Have you traveled a lot?
I've only been to Germany and Hawaii.
translation.de: Bisher war ich in Deutschland und Hawaii.

translation.en: How did you like it?
-I'm actually a Germanophile. -Yeah?
A Germanophile is somebody that loves German things.
translation.de: Das ist jemand, der deutsche Dinge mag.

translation.en: Very nice.
I'm also a bit of an Anglophile.
-So you love English culture? -Yeah.
-What's your favorite? -Their cheeses.
And celebrities from there, as well.
Rosamund Pike, Jack Davenport.
-Alice Eve, Keira Knightley. -[laughs]
-John Cleese, Benedict Cumberbatch. -Yes.
All right, everyone move on to your next date.
All the men to the right.
I actually really enjoyed my time with you. [Taylor] Thank you. I did too.
-[woman] Hi. -Hello.
-[chuckles] I'm Tori. -I'm-- I'm Michael.
-Lovely to meet you. [chuckles] -Likewise.
So what do you do for a living?
I am a mom.
Of a four-year-old girl named Brynne.
translation.de: Von einem vierjährigen Mädchen namens Brynne.

translation.en: -Ah. Nice. -Yeah.
-Are you a single mother? -I am a single mother.
-Oh. -[chuckles]
How does-- how does that feel?
It feels good.
Good to be out of a relationship that didn't work.
translation.de: Vor allem, weil die Beziehung nicht funktioniert hat.

translation.en: -That's understandable. -[chuckles] Yeah.
Do you watch television much?
-No. -Oh.
[chuckles] I don't have a TV at home.
-[chuckles] -That sucks.
I think it's great.
Do you know much about astrology and star signs?
translation.de: Kennst du dich mit Astrologie aus?

translation.en: -No, not too much. -Oh.
-[chuckles] -[host] Everyone on to their next date.
[Tori] See you. Lovely to meet you. -Likewise, Tori. Take care. -[chuckles]
translation.de: -Mach's gut. Hat mich gefreut. -Mich auch, Tori. Alles Gute.

translation.en: [narrator] Ronan has been volunteering for three years at Sydney Motorsport Park.
translation.de: Ronan arbeitet seit drei Jahren als Freiwilliger im Sydney Motorsport Park.

translation.en: I know it's loud, but even so, it's, like, quite exciting.
translation.de: Ich weiß, es ist laut, aber trotzdem ist es ziemlich aufregend.

translation.en: You hear the cars just, like, go zooming past.
translation.de: Man hört, wie die Autos vorbeirasen.

translation.en: Like, you're on the edge of your seat
translation.de: Man sitzt am Rande des Sitzes

translation.en: enjoying the wild ride.
Fifty. Yeah, I've got 50 there.
I check the drivers off in their correct position.
translation.de: Ich überprüfe, ob die Fahrer in der richtigen Position sind.

translation.en: It's like if-- if something isn't right, I-- I go over to the driver and ask.
translation.de: Wenn etwas nicht stimmt, gehe ich zum Fahrer und frage nach.

translation.en: [driver] Nah, mate, this is my spot. This is my starting position.
-This is where I'm starting-- -[Ronan] Sorry, like, this is the law.
translation.de: -Hier starten wir… -Sorry, das sind die Regeln.

translation.en: -I cannot accept it. -[driver] I'm not moving.
Corey! Corey!
-Come quick. -[Corey] Yeah.
What's the problem?
[Ronan] Car 351 is in the wrong position. [Corey] Well, that's where he's qualified to.
You gotta tell him. If he doesn't go now, we are gonna call race control. Simple as that.
translation.de: Sag es ihm. Und wenn er nicht geht, rufen wir die Rennleitung.

translation.en: -[Ronan] Yeah. -[Corey] All right?
[Ronan] Sorry, but if you don't move down, I'll have to call race control.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, aber wenn du nicht fährst, rufe ich die Rennleitung.

translation.en: [driver] Aww, jeez, man. All right.
[Corey] Well done. Well done.
I spoke to him respectfully and said,
translation.de: Ich sprach respektvoll mit ihm und sagte:

translation.en: "I'm sorry, but this grid sheet is where you need to be."
translation.de: "Es tut mir leid, aber hier solltest du stehen."

translation.en: Like, really, I showed-- I showed bravery inside me.
I-- I just showed myself I was boss.
translation.de: Ich habe mir selbst gezeigt, dass ich der Boss bin.

translation.en: -Hello. [chuckles] -[Michael] Hello.
-I'm Jess. -I'm Michael.
-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you as well.
So do you go out much?
Um, spend time with friends whenever I get the chance,
eating out or going to the cinemas.
-What kind of food do you like? -Italian or German.
translation.de: -Was für Essen magst du? -Italienisch oder Deutsch.

translation.en: German? Like schnitzels?
Schnitzels, bratwurst, kranskys.
I love food. [laughs]
Tell me about it.
I went on holiday a while back,
and I just ate my way through the whole holiday.
translation.de: und ich habe die ganze Zeit nur gegessen.

translation.en: There's so much amazing food outside of Australia.
translation.de: Es gibt so tolles Essen außerhalb Australiens.

translation.en: -Where did you go? -I went to Europe.
Where in Europe?
I went to Germany, to England and a few other places. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich war in Deutschland, England und an anderen Orten.

translation.en: Ah, I'd love to visit England. It's cold. [laughs] It's really cold.
translation.de: -Ich würde gern mal nach England. -Es ist sehr kalt dort.

translation.en: So I've heard, yeah.
Do you have any hobbies?
I like watching movies.
-Like what? -I like horror movies.
-Oh. -Yeah. [chuckles]
I also like to watch a lot of thrillers and, um, psychological movies, but…
translation.de: Und ich mag Thriller und psychologische Filme, aber…

translation.en: -Creepy. -Yeah.
Lovely to talk to you.
-Nice to meet you too. -And meeting you as well.
-Enjoy the rest of your dates. -Thank you. Thanks.
-Good luck with the other gentlemen. -You too. [chuckles]
Take care.
-Hello. -[woman] Hi.
-How are you? -I'm good. Yourself?
I'm--
I'm good. [chuckles]
That's good. I'm Michael.
-Nice to meet you. I'm Heather. -Nice to meet you, Heather.
Do you mind if I ask what year you were born?
One year after me.
You're 26?
Yep.
And, um…
Uh, try and think of a question.
[inhales] My mind's at a crossroads.
Um, what are your hobbies?
Watching television shows,
spiritual activities, like meditation, maybe yoga.
translation.de: spirituelle Aktivitäten wie Meditation, vielleicht Yoga.

translation.en: I also wanna start learning how to do tai chi.
-Oh, cool. -Yeah.
What about you?
I like watching Netflix.
Um, have you been overseas before? Yeah, I went to England and Germany.
translation.de: -Warst du schon mal im Ausland? -Ja, ich war in England und Deutschland.

translation.en: I've been to Germany twice. That's cool.
-But I'd love to visit England. -It's a beautiful place, as well.
translation.de: -Ich würde gern nach England. -Ein wunderschöner Ort.

translation.en: -Love their culture. -Yeah.
All the roast ch-- roast lamb and beef and-- yeah.
translation.de: So viel Lammbraten und Rindfleisch. Ja.

translation.en: It's amazing.
Yeah.
And I gotta say, you look absolutely amazing.
Thank you.
Your clothes, your glasses, your hairstyle.
translation.de: Deine Kleidung, deine Brille, deine Frisur.

translation.en: Thank you.
You look amazing too.
Thank you. I love dressing like this anyway.
translation.de: Danke. Ich ziehe mich gern so an.

translation.en: [chuckles] That's cool.
Do you watch television shows much?
I'm sad to admit that I watch The Bachelor.
translation.de: Ich muss zugeben, dass ich Der Bachelor gucke.

translation.en: -The Bachelor? -Yeah.
Never saw that.
The women out on there, they're horrible. Very nasty.
translation.de: Die Frauen dort sind schrecklich. Echt fies.

translation.en: Yeah. So… hmm.
I should also tell you that I'm actually on the spectrum.
translation.de: Ich bin übrigens auf dem Spektrum.

translation.en: -Hmm. -The autism spectrum.
I'm on the spectrum too.
I know, like, all the stuff about Harry Potter… -Ah. -…Star Wars.
translation.de: Ich weiß alles über Harry Potter, Star Wars.

translation.en: So I get hooked onto things easily.
translation.de: Ich mag Dinge schnell sehr gern.

translation.en: -Yeah, same. -Yeah.
[host] All right, that is it. We are done!
Thanks for your time, Heather.
-Thank you for your time too. -[Michael] No problem.
-See you later. -Enjoy your night.
-[chuckles] Thank you. -Thanks. Good luck.
[narrator] At the end of the event, the singles choose who they'd like to see again.
translation.de: Am Ende des Events wählen die Singles, wen sie wiedersehen möchten.

translation.en: They will only be matched if the other person also chooses them.
translation.de: Es entsteht nur Kontakt, wenn sich beide gegenseitig wählen.

translation.en: I've ticked Taylor and Jessica.
translation.de: Ich habe Taylor und Jessica angekreuzt.

translation.en: I'm not gonna go for Tori.
And Amelia? Not really.
Heather, I've ticked her as well.
-[Cian] Are you happy with your decision? -Yep, definitely.
Anna, here's the list.
The lucky list!
-Thank you so much for coming. -No problem.
-I'll give you a call tonight? -[Michael] Sure. Thank you.
-Take care of yourself. See ya. -[Anna] You too, Michael. Bye-bye.
translation.de: -Pass auf dich auf. Tschüs. -Du auch. Tschüs.

translation.en: [Cian] Do you have any rules for dating?
Pay full respect to a girl.
Make eye contact.
Make sure your body language is positive.
translation.de: Achte darauf, dass deine Körpersprache positiv ist.

translation.en: Most importantly, enjoy your lovable activities together.
translation.de: Und das Wichtigste: Genieß die gemeinsamen Aktivitäten.

translation.en: I always want to do the right thing,
translation.de: Ich will immer das Richtige tun.

translation.en: but really, like, one thing I do know,
I have heard about-- about Jodi, like, you know, Jodi, the dating coach?
Like, yeah, she'll…
-She'll possibly teach me a lot. -[Cian] Yeah, if you wanna see her.
translation.de: -Sie bringt mir sicher viel bei. -Wenn du sie treffen willst, ja.

translation.en: -You think that would that be helpful? -Yeah, it would be helpful.
translation.de: -Wäre das hilfreich? -Ja. Es wäre hilfreich, denn dann würde ich jede Menge Tipps bekommen.

translation.en: Because then I would be given a few-- lots of tips.
translation.de: Es wäre hilfreich, denn dann würde ich jede Menge Tipps bekommen.

translation.en: [narrator] Jodi Rodgers is a relationship specialist who works with autistic adults,
translation.de: Jodi Rodgers ist eine Beziehungsexpertin, die mit autistischen Erwachsenen arbeitet und ihnen bei der Suche nach Liebe hilft.

translation.en: helping them in their search for love.
translation.de: die mit autistischen Erwachsenen arbeitet und ihnen bei der Suche nach Liebe hilft.

translation.en: Hello, I'm Jodi.
-I'm Ronan. -Lovely to meet you.
-Is it okay if I come in? -[Ronan] Pleasure. Yeah. Definitely.
[Jodi] We're not born with social skills.
We are taught social skills. We're taught greetings.
translation.de: Sie werden uns beigebracht. Begrüßungen etwa.

translation.en: We're taught how to have a back-and-forth conversation.
translation.de: Wir lernen, wie man sich unterhält.

translation.en: -Jodi, this is my mom. -Yes.
-My mom Linda. -Hi, Jodi. I'm Linda…
[Jodi] Some people have much more innate ability to pick up social skills quickly,
translation.de: Manche Menschen lernen soziale Fähigkeiten von Natur aus sehr schnell,

translation.en: and for many autistic people, learning social skills is not easy.
translation.de: und für viele Autisten ist es schwer, soziale Fähigkeiten zu erlernen.

translation.en: Here's your chair, Jodi.
[laughs] Thank you.
We also have to remember that autism is as diverse
translation.de: Wir müssen daran denken, dass Autismus so verschieden ist,

translation.en: in people's need for support from others
as it is in its presentation itself.
So what things did you want help with today?
'Cause I hear that you might be going on your first date?
translation.de: Ich hörte, du hast bald dein erstes Date?

translation.en: -The first date, yeah. -[gasps]
So I've never been on a date before, but--
translation.de: Ich war noch nie auf einem Date, aber…

translation.en: but really, this is like something for me to achieve on,
translation.de: Aber das ist etwas, was ich erreichen möchte.

translation.en: like a relationship as boyfriend and girlfriend.
translation.de: Aber das ist etwas, was ich erreichen möchte. Eine Beziehung als Freund und Freundin.

translation.en: So when you think about having a girlfriend,
translation.de: Wenn du darüber nachdenkst, eine Freundin zu haben,

translation.en: what does that mean to you?
It means, like, I feel warm and comfortable.
translation.de: Ich fühle mich gut und wohl.

translation.en: There's no any problems, that you're happy and calm.
translation.de: Es gibt keine Probleme. Man ist glücklich und ruhig.

translation.en: Tell you what, I wish there was no problems.
translation.de: Ich wünschte, es gäbe keine Probleme.

translation.en: When you have a girlfriend, there's still problems.
translation.de: Auch mit Freundin gibt es noch Probleme.

translation.en: -Still problems? -Still problems.
-Having a girlfriend's a beautiful thing. -[Ronan] Yeah.
But it doesn't make everything perfect.
translation.de: Aber es macht nicht alles perfekt.

translation.en: You have to really try with another person.
translation.de: Man muss auf die andere Person eingehen.

translation.en: It's all about looking after one another, and all of that can be really, really hard work.
translation.de: Es geht darum, sich umeinander zu kümmern, und das kann harte Arbeit sein.

translation.en: -Yeah. -But it's like driving the fastest car
translation.de: Es ist, als fährt man das schnellste Auto

translation.en: on the hardest track.
Yeah.
Would you say, "No, no, I don't wanna do that because it's too hard,"
translation.de: Sagst du: "Ich will das nicht machen, weil es zu schwer ist",

translation.en: or would you be brave and give it a go?
translation.de: oder bist du mutig und versuchst es?

translation.en: I would be brave and give it a go.
translation.de: Ich bin mutig und versuche es.

translation.en: That's just what building a relationship's like.
translation.de: So baut man eine Beziehung auf.

translation.en: Yeah.
If you go on your very first date,
how do you think you're gonna feel on your first date?
translation.de: Wie wirst du dich wohl fühlen?

translation.en: Well, most people would feel a bit nervous.
translation.de: Die meisten Leute wären etwas nervös.

translation.en: Yeah.
But I'm brave and-- and I'm excited, like--
translation.de: Aber ich bin mutig und freue mich…

translation.en: like, doing something new and special that I've never done before.
translation.de: Ich freue mich, etwas Neues und Besonderes zu tun.

translation.en: That is so excellent.
That is such a good way to think about the world.
translation.de: Das ist so eine gute Einstellung.

translation.en: So what do you think that you need help from me with, if you're brave and excited?
translation.de: Wobei brauchst du meine Hilfe, wenn du mutig bist und dich freust?

translation.en: So, really, like, something for me to learn
on having a date is, like, conversation driving,
translation.de: wenn ich ein Date habe, ist der Gesprächsfluss.

translation.en: as in showing a lot of interest
and you're involved, and you wanna discuss more.
translation.de: und dass man noch mehr besprechen will.

translation.en: I reckon we should have a bit of a practice, you and me,
translation.de: Wir beide könnten ein bisschen üben.

translation.en: just at how you'll get-- how you could keep the conversation going.
translation.de: Wir beide könnten ein bisschen üben. Wie du das Gespräch am Laufen hältst.

translation.en: Or maybe you can pretend you're going on a picnic together.
translation.de: Ihr könntet so tun, als würdet ihr ein Picknick machen.

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Jodi] Come into the kitchen.
-Is that all right? -Yeah.
[Jodi] So, if you and I pretend we're outside and we're actually at the picnic,
translation.de: Wir beide tun also so, als wären wir bei einem Picknick.

translation.en: what activities will you do on the picnic?
translation.de: Was macht man bei einem Picknick?

translation.en: There's, like, Frisbee.
So you have a conversation about the Frisbee with me.
translation.de: Du sprichst mit mir also über Frisbee?

translation.en: -Get me in on the conversation. -Yeah.
Like, do you like playing Frisbee?
Yes.
-How about we play Frisbee together? -Oh, that'd be lovely.
So it's really like-- really like throwing the ball and catching it,
translation.de: Es ist, als werfe man einen Ball hin und her,

translation.en: but instead, it's different with a Frisbee.
It'd be great, so…
-Can I show you something? -Yeah, um… Can I just use Mom's pen?
translation.de: Kann ich dir etwas zeigen? Darf ich Mums Stift nehmen?

translation.en: -Come here with me for a sec. -Am I-- am I not paying attention?
translation.de: Komm kurz mit. Bin ich nicht aufmerksam?

translation.en: No, no, you're doing a great job. I'm so impressed with you.
translation.de: Nein, du machst das toll. Ich bin beeindruckt.

translation.en: What's that say?
[Ronan] That's a "no."
-[Jodi] And what's this one say? -[Ronan] "Yes."
When we ask people questions that finish with--
translation.de: Wenn wir Leuten Fragen stellen, die mit…

translation.en: Oh, no. It has to be, like, just what, who and how questions.
translation.de: Oh nein. Es müssen Fragen mit "was", "wer" und "wie" sein.

translation.en: Now you're on it. Now you're on it.
Because if you just said to me, "How would you--"
translation.de: Denn wenn du mich fragst: "Wollen wir…"

translation.en: -Uh, what did you say about--? -"How'd you like to play Frisbee with me?"
Yes, I would.
Oh, no, that wasn't-- that wouldn't be enough.
It can't-- it cannot be-- it cannot be yes or no question.
translation.de: Es darf keine Ja- oder Nein-Frage sein.

translation.en: Has to be only what, who and how and where.
No, no, you can definitely have yes or no,
but then if I wanted to keep you talking, what would be another question I'd ask?
translation.de: Aber wenn ich will, dass du weiterredest, was könnte ich dich noch fragen?

translation.en: What cars-- why don't you like Fords?
translation.de: Welche Autos… Warum magst du Fords nicht?

translation.en: Perfect. See? You know all of those techniques.
What, who, where and how and why?
translation.de: Was, wer, wo, wie und warum?

translation.en: Yeah, you're brilliant at this. So now let's have another practice.
translation.de: Du bist wirklich gut darin. Üben wir weiter.

translation.en: What other activities will you do on your picnic?
translation.de: Was macht man beim Picknick noch?

translation.en: Maybe we could walk along the beach together.
translation.de: Wir könnten am Strand spazieren gehen.

translation.en: I'd love that. I love walking along the beach.
translation.de: Das klingt toll. Ich gehe gern am Strand entlang.

translation.en: So wh-- why do you like walking along the beach?
translation.de: Warum gehst du gern am Strand entlang?

translation.en: [Jodi chuckles] Now you got it.
So you don't need to worry about it.
You're a really great communicator, Ronan. Really good.
translation.de: Du bist wirklich gut darin, dich zu unterhalten.

translation.en: This is just you being you.
I'm hanging to hear about this first date.
translation.de: Ich bin sehr auf dein Date gespannt.

translation.en: -[Linda chuckles] Yeah. -Yeah.
You're definitely gonna contact me and let me know how it goes?
translation.de: Rufst du mich an und sagst mir, wie es gelaufen ist?

translation.en: -Yeah, definitely. -[Jodi] Yeah.
Because I'll be having that feeling to going,
translation.de: Denn ich werde die ganze Zeit denken:

translation.en: "Hope it goes good. Hope it goes good. Hope it goes good."
-Yeah! -[laughing]
You're gonna be brilliant.
Always.
[Jodi] Now, do you wanna walk me out to the door?
translation.de: Bringst du mich noch zur Tür?

translation.en: [Ronan] Yeah, definitely.
Ronan has so much to offer
translation.de: Ronan hat so viel zu bieten.

translation.en: because he's got so many different interests and skills
translation.de: Er hat so viele Interessen und Fähigkeiten,

translation.en: that other people will find really, really appealing.
I think any girl that gets to go on a date with Ronan
translation.de: Jedes Mädchen, das ein Date mit Ronan hat,

translation.en: is going to be a really, really lucky girl.
-That's been a really fun afternoon. -Yeah, it was a pleasure.
translation.de: -Das war ein toller Nachmittag. -Ja, es war mir ein Vergnügen.

translation.en: -[Jodi chuckles] Thank you. -Thanks.
translation.de: -Das war ein toller Nachmittag. -Ja, es war mir ein Vergnügen. -Vielen Dank. -Danke.

translation.en: -Catch you later, Jodi. -[Jodi] See ya.
[narrator] Kassandra is getting ready to step out on her first date in months.
translation.de: Kassandra bereitet sich auf ihr erstes Date seit Monaten vor.

translation.en: Kassandra is meeting Tom.
He likes scratching a dog's itch
translation.de: Er mag es, Hunden beim Kratzen zu helfen

translation.en: and playing guitar rock.
He doesn't like windy days
or crooked pictures on walls.
-Hi, there. -Hello. How are you going?
-Good. My name's Kass. -I'm Tom.
-Nice to meet you, Tom. -Likewise.
You look good. I like your shirt.
Thanks. It's a shirt from a John Lennon design collection. -Oh, I love John Lennon. -Mm-hmm.
translation.de: -Es ist aus John Lennons Kollektion. -Ich liebe John Lennon.

translation.en: -Um, should we go inside? -Let's.
-[laughs] Hi! -Hey.
So, um, you might be able to tell 'cause of the long hair, I really, um, I really love music.
translation.de: Vielleicht verraten es die langen Haare, aber ich liebe Musik.

translation.en: -[Kassandra] Mm-hmm. -So, um, yeah, so, um…
Yeah, I grew up listening to The Beatles, um, and Led Zeppelin really early,
translation.de: Als ich klein war, hörte ich die Beatles und Led Zeppelin,

translation.en: and then I got into Queen and, um, and all-- all kind-- I've got--
translation.de: dann habe ich Queen entdeckt und die ganzen…

translation.en: I have all of these bands that have just influenced who I am today.
translation.de: All diese Bands haben beeinflusst, wer ich heute bin.

translation.en: -I'm a dance teacher. -Nice.
So I listen to a lot of different styles of music as well.
translation.de: Also höre ich viele verschiedene Musikstile.

translation.en: -Excellent. -And I've performed in musical theater.
Okay, what have you performed in? [chuckles] Uh, most recently, it was Shrek The Musical.
translation.de: -Wobei hast du mitgespielt? -Zuletzt war es Shrek The Musical.

translation.en: Oh, uh, in the professional cast, was it?
Um, no, it was in the community theater.
Okay, um, yeah, so we had a production of, um, Shrek The Musical at my work
translation.de: Wir hatten vor ein paar Jahren eine Produktion davon auf der Arbeit,

translation.en: a few years ago with Jay Laga'aia playing the title role.
translation.de: bei der Jay Laga'aia die Titelrolle spielte.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, I came and watched that one. -Nice.
-That's awesome. -Excellent.
I really do like your shirt. That is really cool.
translation.de: Ich mag dein Hemd wirklich gern.

translation.en: Yeah, I've got a-- I've got, um, two more John Lennon-designed shirts.
translation.de: Ich habe noch zwei Hemden, die von John Lennon entworfen wurden.

translation.en: Um, I could've worn one of them.
Unfort-- unfortunately, um, this-- Actually, this one-- start that one again.
translation.de: Leider ist das hier… Ich fange noch mal an.

translation.en: So, um, this one, uh, was probably the best one, uh, for me to choose.
translation.de: Das war wohl die beste Wahl für mich.

translation.en: -Awesome. Well, it looks good. -Mm-hmm. Thanks. Mm-hmm.
Um, yeah, so… [chuckles]
So, um, so what's the dress you're wearing there?
translation.de: Was für ein Kleid trägst du?

translation.en: Um, it's from Princess Highway. It's, um, the Musgrave Bunny dress.
translation.de: Es ist von Princess Highway. Das Musgrave-Häschen-Kleid.

translation.en: Ah, yeah.
My mom likes to get a lot of clothes for me that are "alternative fashion."
translation.de: Meine Mutter kauft mir gern alternative Klamotten.

translation.en: -Okay. -Um…
-Yeah. -Mm-hmm.
Would-- would you like to get a drink?
-Yeah, okay. -Nice.
What do you do for, I guess, fun?
Um, I-- I, um, I generally, um--
What I've been doing is, um, sorting out all of my family's music collections,
translation.de: Ich sortiere die Musiksammlungen meiner Familie,

translation.en: both, uh, digitally at the moment,
and I'm doing our vinyl records and CDs at the moment too.
translation.de: und ich sortiere unsere CDs und Schallplatten.

translation.en: One of the records that I've been listening to quite a bit
translation.de: Eine Platten, die ich mir oft anhöre,

translation.en: is, um, OK Computer by Radiohead.
Okay, I didn't think they'd have records.
translation.de: Ich hätte nicht gedacht, dass sie Platten haben.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Wow.
-[chuckles] That's really cool. Sorry. -That's all right.
translation.de: -Das ist cool. Tut mir leid. -Schon gut.

translation.en: -Um, I'm just a bit nervous. -Um, yeah.
So I-- I'm just, um-- just a little bit tri-- trippy.
Just, um, I'm trying to, um, make up conversation.
That's all right. Um, I haven't been on a first date in a while.
translation.de: Schon gut. Ich hatte lange kein erstes Date mehr.

translation.en: That's all right.
So…
[Cian] You okay, Kassandra?
I'm struggling a little bit with what to talk about.
translation.de: Ich habe Probleme, Gesprächsthemen zu finden.

translation.en: Um, I think I'm actually on the verge of a bit of a panic attack,
translation.de: Ich bin wohl kurz vor einer Panikattacke,

translation.en: so I might need to take a break, if that's okay, soon.
translation.de: also würde ich gern eine Pause machen.

translation.en: [Cian] Yeah, yeah, of course.
I don't know if it's because it's been a really long week for me.
translation.de: Vielleicht, weil es eine lange Woche war.

translation.en: I might find the bathrooms.
[Cian] Of course. Of course. Do whatever you need to do.
translation.de: Natürlich. Tu, was du tun musst.

translation.en: [Kassandra] Hey.
-Um, sorry about that. -That's all right. [sighs]
Um, I've actually started having a panic attack.
-Oh, sh-- okay. You okay? -Yeah. I just, um…
translation.de: Geht es dir gut? Ja. Ich…

translation.en: Is it okay if, like… I go?
translation.de: Wäre es okay, wenn ich gehe?

translation.en: -That's all right. -Um…
-Is there anything I can do for you? -Um, no.
No worries, Kass.
-Nice to meet you. -Likewise.
-[Kassandra] Okay, thank you. -No worries.
-Okay. -[Kassandra sniffles]
-Hey, Mom. -Oh, Mike.
-Hi, Dad. -How are you doing?
-Good. Yourself? -How did you go?
-Very well. -Come and take a seat.
-[Michael] Sure. Okay. -I wanna hear everything.
Every detail.
[Michael] There were five women, of course.
And only one of them was on the spectrum, of course.
translation.de: Nur eine war auf dem Spektrum.

translation.en: -Oh, was it? Okay. -Yeah, her name's Heather.
Right. Did you tick Heather?
Yes, I also ticked two other girls named Jessica and Taylor.
translation.de: Ja. Ich habe auch zwei Mädchen namens Jessica und Taylor angekreuzt.

translation.en: And so do you think any of them liked you?
translation.de: Glaubst du, eine davon mochte dich?

translation.en: -I think they do. -[mother] Yeah?
But I'm gonna get a call pretty soon about what matches I got.
translation.de: Aber ich werde gleich angerufen wegen meiner Treffer.

translation.en: Ooh, that's exciting. Are you excited?
-Yes, I hope Taylor will be one of them. -I'm excited! You hope Taylor?
translation.de: Ja. Ich hoffe, Taylor ist einer. -Taylor? -Ja.

translation.en: -Yeah. -[mother gasps]
Hello.
Hi, Michael. It's Anna. I'm calling from speed dating.
translation.de: Hi, Michael. Hier ist Anna vom Speed Dating.

translation.en: Yes.
You have a match. I'm very excited.
translation.de: Du hast einen Treffer. Das ist toll.

translation.en: -And it's Heather. -[gasps] Yes! Yes!
And I'll give you her mobile number. Have you got a pen there?
translation.de: Ich gebe dir ihre Nummer. Hast du einen Stift?

translation.en: -I'll get one. -[Michael] Yes.
-Is-- was she my only match? -She's your only match tonight.
translation.de: -War sie der einzige Treffer? -Dein einziger heute.

translation.en: -Oh. -[father] Exciting, Michael.
Yeah, and some people go to speed dating, and they get no matches, so I was very excited for you.
translation.de: Manche haben gar keine Treffer, also freue ich mich sehr für dich.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Oh, yeah.
Thank you.
-[mouths] That's exciting! -Okay. All right, Michael.
-Have a great night. Bye-bye. -Take care.
Aww, that's so good.
-So, high five. -Thanks.
-Thanks, Mom. -[mother] Very good.
Well done, Mike, and who knows what the future holds.
translation.de: Gut gemacht, Mike. Wer weiß, was die Zukunft bringt.

translation.en: Just a matter of time. It's about getting to know one another.
-Just see what happens. -Hmm.
That's what a tuba sounds like.
It's hard to make a tuba sound really good on its own, isn't it?
translation.de: Es ist schwer, eine Tuba allein gut klingen zu lassen.

translation.en: But when it's in the band, it sounds really good.
translation.de: -In der Band klingt sie wirklich gut. -Welche Band?

translation.en: -[Cian] Which band? -I play in the Sutherland Shire band.
translation.de: -In der Band klingt sie wirklich gut. -Welche Band? Ich spiele in der Sutherland Shire Band.

translation.en: [Cian] Cool. You do so many things, Ronan.
translation.de: Cool. Du machst so viel, Ronan.

translation.en: -Sure do. -[Linda chuckles]
[Cian] Are you gonna have time for a girlfriend?
translation.de: Ist da Zeit für eine Freundin?

translation.en: Hopefully.
I think you'll have to make time for the girlfriend, won't you?
translation.de: Du wirst dir Zeit für die Freundin nehmen.

translation.en: Make time?
[Linda] Well, you have to, otherwise you would never see each other.
translation.de: Musst du, sonst seht ihr euch nie.

translation.en: [narrator] It's a special day for Ronan.
translation.de: Es ist ein besonderer Tag für Ronan.

translation.en: He's getting ready to step out on his first-ever date.
translation.de: Er bereitet sich auf sein erstes Date vor.

translation.en: [Cian] How you feeling, Ronan?
Feeling excited.
[exhales] I'm always well prepared
to look very presentable.
Almost as in tip-top shape.
-[Cian] Big day. -It's a big day.
He's confident. He doesn't get nervous.
translation.de: Er ist selbstsicher. Er wird nicht nervös.

translation.en: It's all just gonna depend on that conversation
translation.de: Es hängt alles vom Gespräch ab,

translation.en: and keeping the conversation going.
translation.de: und es am Laufen zu halten.

translation.en: It's very exciting, very proud of him.
translation.de: Sehr aufregend. Ich bin stolz auf ihn.

translation.en: I'm all ready.
-Okay. So you've done everything? -I've done everything.
-Checked everything off? -Checked everything off.
-Yeah, and feeling good? -Feeling good, yeah.
translation.de: -Fühlst du dich gut? -Ich fühle mich gut.

translation.en: Okay, let's just make sure before we close that up.
translation.de: Gehen wir das noch mal durch.

translation.en: -Yep. -What have you got?
I've got chocolate, sandwiches and strawberries.
Excellent. All right. So we can close that up.
translation.de: Dann können wir die Box schließen.

translation.en: All right.
[Linda] What do you think she's gonna be like, Ronan?
translation.de: Wie wird sie wohl sein, Ronan?

translation.en: Maybe she'll be like a-- a lovely lady.
translation.de: Vielleicht ist sie eine reizende Dame.

translation.en: That would be perfect for you, wouldn't it?
translation.de: Das wäre perfekt für dich, oder?

translation.en: Exactly.
-Gonna open the door up here for you. -[Ronan] Yep.
-Off you go. Have a wonderful day. -[exclaims]
translation.de: Und ab mit dir. Hab einen schönen Tag.

translation.en: -Sure will. [chuckles] -I'm so excited for you.
-[Linda] Bye, sweetheart. -See ya, Mom!
-[Linda] Have a great day! Bye. -See ya. See ya.
[sighs] Now I'm nervous.
